title: Retaliation
description: Rebellion gave the Abydans their freedom, but unexpected betrayal has endangered new alliances. Now, with chaos in the streets, the time is ripe for the return of the enraged Hathor, Ra's successor, and her legions. Having bided her time, she plots the reconquest of the world. This time she brings a weapon more awesome than the rebels can imagine - for Hathor's bloodthirsty plans extend well beyond the Stargate. Based on the movie Stargate and its story and characters, this adult novelization was written by Bill McCay. McCay also wrote the novelization for "Stargate: Rebellion."
author: Bill McCay
